import React, { Fragment, useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Row, Col, Card, CardHeader, CardFooter, Media } from 'reactstrap'; import axios from 'axios' import { Follower, Following, TotalPost} from '../../../../../constant' const FriendsTab = ({ user }) => { const [cards,setCards] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { // axios.get(`${process.env.PUBLIC_URL}/api/usercard.json`).then(res => setCards(res.data)) },[]) return ( {cards.map((cardItem, i) =>

{cardItem.name}

{cardItem.post}
{Follower}

{cardItem.follower}

{Following}

{cardItem.following}K

{TotalPost}

{cardItem.totalPost}M

 )} ); }; export default FriendsTab;
